shortDescription: Unspecified vulnerability in JustSystems Ichitaro 2006 through 2013; Ichitaro Pro through 2; Ichitaro Government 6, 7, and 2006 through 2010; Ichitaro Portable with oreplug; Ichitaro Viewer; and Ichitaro JUST School through 2010 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted document.
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
